title: Railworks TS2014 The Riviera Line Updated 15.05.2014
description:
This is the updated version that addresses:

Floating scenery issues
New scenery assets added at Sprey Point and Exeter
A problem in placing rolling stock at Exeter and Paignton
Missing winter textures at Paignton and Exeter now resolved.

The English Riviera comes to Train Simulator in the beautifully picturesque The Riviera Line: Exeter-Paignton route, which runs through some of the most scenic landscape in England. 

Included with the route is a First Great Western Class 143, recreating the Ã¢â‚¬ËœPacerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ two-car DMU that is a stalwart of the line. Based on a Walter Alexander bus body, the Ã¢â‚¬ËœNodding DonkeyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ was introduced to the rail network in the mid-1980s and is well known for its unsophisticated bouncy ride and meagre seating, faithfully recreated in this model. Also included is a Quick Drive compatible High Speed Train (HST) in First Great Western livery.




Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
